full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKABS KUN TU NYE BAR MKHO BA BSAG SBYANG GI GNAD BSDUS PA'I YIG CHUNG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES SKABS KUN TU NYE BAR MKHO BA BSAG SBYANG GI GNAD BSDUS PA'I YIG CHUNG 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MAS AERTE NI MER GEN NO YON HU THOG THUNG BSNGAGS PA, BDAG CAG GI @006B DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAMPA BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS MED MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYIS, ZHAL 'DON MANG PO GSUNG RGYU YOD PA DE THAMS CAD KYI MJUG TU 'DON RGYU ZHIG DGOS, ZHES RAB DKAR LHA RDZAS BCAS BKA' LGUNG BSTZAL BA SPYI BOS NOD DE, ZHAL 'DON SNGA MA RNAMS KYI LHAG CHAD KHA BSKANG DANG BTANG RAG GI TSUL DU YAN LAG BDUN PA 'BUL NA 'BREL CHAGS SHING, 'DI TZAM LA LEGS PAR GOMS PAS KYANG DGE SBYOR GZHAN DANG GZHAN LA BOGS 'DON DU 'GYUR BA LAS 'GAL BA MED PAR BSAMS NAS, MGON PO GANG GI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS LEGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, CHOS MTHUN GYI SLOB BU DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG RDO RJES BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
